name: MAIne - Minecraft Clone
description:
MAIne is a "totally not inspired by an other famous block game"  sandbox game.

The ambition and goal of this project is to implement trained AI into a voxel world where they could build structure by editing the terrain or hunting the player down.

For now, the state of the project is a nice sandbox game where the player can explore the world freely.

Controlls :

LEFT CLICK - PUNCH

RIGHT CLICK - USE ITEM

WASD - MOVE

MOUSE SCROLL / 0..9 : CHANGE ITEM

SPACE - JUMP

E - OPEN INVENTORY

F3 - SHOW INFORMATIONS

F5 - SWITCH FIRST/THIRD PERSON

ESCAPE - MENU / PAUSE GAME

DON'T FORGET TO DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR BETTER PERFORMANCES. THE WEB APPLICATION IS MORE FOR DEMONSTRATION PURPOSES.

For those interested, the project will be upload on GitHub once I put some order and comment the files properly.
